### Tender Information

**Tender Title**                    
Access Control and Alarm Monitoring

**Reference Number**                    
cb-7585-48617196

### Tenders Details

* **Publication Date**: 27 July 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 06 September 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 02 October 2023

### Description

This tender is being issued to satisfy the requirement of the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) for the provision of services for Access Control, Intrusion Detection, Alarm System Monitoring on a 24/7 basis for the current integrated Kantech Entrapass System access control system. 

The awarded contract will be for five (5) years, plus three (3) irrevocable option(s), allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s) by one-year each.

### Service Delivery

The services will be delivered across various regions in Canada, including:

* British Columbia 
* National Capital Region (NCR) 
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Quebec (except NCR)

### Contract Award Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
